translations: 向……授权；委派（depute 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He was deputed to put our views to the committee.
sentences.translation: 他获授权向委员会表达我们的观点。

sentences.sentence: A subcommittee was deputed to investigate the claims.
sentences.translation: 一个委员会专门小组受托去核实索赔事宜。

sentences.sentence: I have deputed the accounts to John.
